autoSave.description: General--Automatically save the content being edited.

autoSaveDelay.description: General--How long do you want to save your document(ms)?

titleBarStyle.description: General--The title bar style (Windows and Linux system only).

openFilesInNewWindow.description: General--Open files in a new window.

openFolderInNewWindow.description: General--Open folder via menu in a new window.

fileSortBy.description: General--Sort files in opened folder by created time, modified time and title.

startUpAction.description: General--The action after Mark Text startup, open the last edited content, open the specified folder or blank page

defaultDirectoryToOpen.description: General--The default directory that should be opened on startup when startUp=folder.

codeFontSize.description: Editor--Font size in code Block, the range is 12 ~ 18

codeFontFamily.description: Editor--Font family used in code block

endOfLine.description: Editor--The newline character used at the end of each line. The default value is default, which will be selected according to your system intelligence.

hideQuickInsertHint.description: Editor--Hide hint for quickly creating paragraphs

bulletListMarker.description: Markdown--The marker used in bullet list

orderListDelimiter.description: Markdown--The dilimiter used in order list

preferHeadingStyle.description: Markdown--The preferred heading style in Mark Text

tabSize.description: Markdown--Replace the tab with x spaces

theme.description: Theme--Select the theme used in Mark Text

imageInsertAction.description: Image--The default behavior after insert image from local folder

sideBarVisibility.description: View--Whether the side bar is visible.

sourceCodeModeEnabled.description: View--Whether the source-code mode is enabled by default.
